articles.description: Malthouse Theatre is converting its courtyard into a big new outdoors venue, which will open in January with a season of music, comedy and theatre.
articles.content:
2020 has been exhausting, Lutton said. "You want to provide artists and audiences with goals to look forward to, markers into the future. But we had to constantly change [plans]."
